name: April's Flower
description:
Necessary Notes:

1. Please do not reuse an object more than once, it can cause bugs.

2. If the plant does not change after watering, please water it more than once.

3. Please do not click on the envelope when there is no new letter alert.

4. Once the game has started, please adjust the window to full screen.

Introduction：

The takes place in the future.

You, Oli, changed from a mutant back to a human through a brutal experiment many years ago. 

You adopt the child of a girl from the same project you took part in and name him April. You raise him up and support him to chase his dream. One day, you receive a flower seed from the Old World from April. 

This is the second life you raise.

If you are interested in a prequel to this story, link：https://yuyif5.itch.io/being-human-again
